content: निधिः [नि-धा-आधारे कि] {@--1@} Abode, receptacle, reservoir; जल°, तोय°, तपोनिधि &c. {@--2@} A store-house, treasury. {@--3@} A treasure, store, hoard, (for the nine treasures of Kubera, see नवनिधि). {@--4@} The ocean. {@--5@} An epithet of Viṣṇu. {@--6@} A man endowed with many good qualities.
